MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Aberfoyle Street and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:30pm due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 6:54 PM on Thursday, 07 January 2021.
